title: From Adjusting Her Saree To Giving A Flying Kiss, Here’s All That Happened At DeepVeer’s Bengaluru Reception
description: The wedding celebrations for Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh aren’t over as of yet. Last night, the happy-in-love couple threw a wedding reception for their friends and family in Bengaluru, which is Deepika’s hometown. As they made their entry dressed up like royalty, they made several heads turn.
